title: Make the initial Play button black and larger on the Home screen

requirements.text: Update the Home screenâ€™s main Play/Pause button so that when the app is in the initial (not playing) state, the Play button appears with a black background and a larger size than it is currently.

quotes: Can you make the initial play button black and bigger?

acceptanceCriteria: On the Home screen (frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx), when isPlaying is false, the circular Play button renders with a black background and visibly larger dimensions than before.
The Play icon inside the button scales appropriately with the new larger button size (no clipping/misalignment).
When isPlaying is true (Pause state) and when connecting/loading, the button remains functional and the UI does not visually regress (disabled/loading behavior still works).

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn components); only compose/override via props/classes where used.
nonGoals: Do not change the Play/Pause button styling on other screens (e.g., NowPlayingScreen, MiniPlayer) unless required to keep behavior consistent with the Home screen request.
